articles.caption: A look at AMD Q3 rev of $5.6B (up 29% but down 93% in profits)
articles.title: AMD posts Q3 revenue of $5.6B, up 29% but profits slip 93% | VentureBeat
articles.description: Advanced Micro Devices reported that its third-quarter revenues were $5.6 billion for the three months ended September 30, up 29%.

articles.caption: A look at Microsoft losing $100-$200 for each Xbox sale
articles.title: Microsoft loses up to $200 when someone buys an Xbox
articles.description: Xbox boss Phil Spencer said the company loses up to $200 each time someone buys an Xbox Series X or Xbox Series S.

articles.caption: A look at Fornite helping Xbox Cloud Gaming grow 10M users in 6 months
articles.title: Fortnite Helped Xbox Cloud Gaming Grow Lifetime Users from 10 Million to 20 Million in Six Months | Newzoo
articles.description: In May, Xbox added a free-to-access cloud version of Fortnite to Xbox Cloud Gaming. The impact has been astounding. Read on for an analysis.

articles.caption: A look at Twitch partnering with Xbox for free PC Game Pass subscription
articles.title: Twitch partners with Xbox for free PC Game Pass subscriptions when you buy subs - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is teaming up with Twitch as it seeks to capitalize on PC Game Pass growth. Twitch will give away free months of PC Game Pass subscriptions when users buy two subs.

articles.caption: A look at Roblox + Parsons School of Design creating a digital fashion course
articles.title: Roblox and Parsons School of Design are creating a digital fashion course - The Verge
articles.description: A new course created by Parsons School of Design in collaboration with Roblox will teach students about fashion design in the metaverse. The gaming giant worked with faculty to create the 16-week class.

articles.caption: A look at PlayStation Plus losing 1.9M subscribers since June
articles.title: PlayStation Plus has lost 1.9 million users since relaunching in June
articles.description: PlayStation Plus has lost 1.9 million subscribers since it was repositioned and relaunched as a more serious Xbox Game Pass competitor.

articles.caption: A look at Stepn founders' NFT marketplace idea
articles.title: The Block: Stepn founders' bright idea for its new NFT marketplace: compulsory royalties
articles.description: Mooar looks set to offer an alternative to the optional-royalty model which has become commonplace.

articles.caption: A look at the creator of Magic The Gathering creator Richard Garfield's new project: Blockchain Brawlers
articles.title: Magic creator Richard Garfield releases new pvp card game | VentureBeat
articles.description: Game designer Richard Garfield, in partnership with Tyranno Studios, is launching a new game. Blockchain Brawlers is a wrestling card game.

articles.description: Danish startup modl.ai has raised ~$8.4M to fund development of QA and playtesting bots that mimic human players via AI and machine learning.

articles.caption: A look at CoD: Modern Warefare II earning $800M in 3 days
articles.title: Modern Warfare II earned a record-breaking $800 million in three days
articles.description: Modern Warfare II has delivered the biggest launch weekend in Call of Duty history after topping $800 million in sell-through revenue in three days.
